    1. Prioritize cis-eQTL using ProxSeek

    Prioritize-cis-eqtl.Rmd
    #### 1. Load ProxSeek R package
library(ProxSeek)
    #### 2. Load demo cis-eQTL dataset
demo.ciseqtl.file<-system.file("data", "ciseqtl.csv", package = "ProxSeek")
demo.ciseqtl.file
    ## [1] "/tmp/Rtmpkvr3pa/temp_libpath74e77fc2c8f6/ProxSeek/data/ciseqtl.csv"
    library(data.table)
cis.eqtl.df<-fread(demo.ciseqtl.file)
head(cis.eqtl.df)
    ##           snps            gene statistic        pvalue           FDR       beta
## 1: 19:55897327 ENSG00000108107 -37.38832 4.051644e-190 5.884748e-182 -7.5015362
## 2: 19:36232420 ENSG00000126246 -36.42497 1.073309e-183 1.948639e-176 -0.1682725
## 3: 19:36232923 ENSG00000126246 -36.42497 1.073309e-183 1.948639e-176 -0.1682725
## 4: 19:36234489 ENSG00000126246 -36.42497 1.073309e-183 1.948639e-176 -0.1682725
## 5: 19:36235431 ENSG00000126246 -36.42497 1.073309e-183 1.948639e-176 -0.1682725
## 6: 19:36235928 ENSG00000126246 -36.42497 1.073309e-183 1.948639e-176 -0.1682725
##    Symbol chr      pos
## 1:  RPL28  19 55897327
## 2: IGFLR1  19 36232420
## 3: IGFLR1  19 36232923
## 4: IGFLR1  19 36234489
## 5: IGFLR1  19 36235431
## 6: IGFLR1  19 36235928
    #### 3. Download the P_PIR_folder to your local computer and assign the P_PIR_folder file path
demo.P.PIR<-system.file("data", package = "ProxSeek")
demo.P.PIR
    ## [1] "/tmp/Rtmpkvr3pa/temp_libpath74e77fc2c8f6/ProxSeek/data"
    list.files(demo.P.PIR) # you should see a list of P_PIR_cell.csv files
    ## [1] "chr19_geno_loc2.csv" "chr19_geno2.csv"     "ciseqtl.csv"        
## [4] "Covariates.csv"      "GE2.csv"             "geneloc_TSS2.csv"   
## [7] "P_PIR_Mon.csv"
    #### 3. Run ProxSeek to prioritize cis-eQTLs
result <- ProxSeek_selectProxCis(ciseqtl.file = demo.ciseqtl.file, P_PIR_folder = demo.P.PIR, cell.type = "Mon", n.cluster = 4)

head(result)
    ### Check how many were located within P-PIR regions
table(result$Within)
    ## 
## No_HiC_Support       non_PPIR            PIR       Promoter 
##           8913          14411           1052           2556
